add_by_ip.title: Manually add
add_by_ip.no_new_devices_hint: All found TVs are already added. Try to add your TV manually.

inform.title: Important information
inform.text-1: For stable operation, please assign a static IP address to your Android TV device. After doing this, you can press next. Most devices can be autodetected, if this does not work you can add your device by entering the IP address.
inform.text-2: Be aware that Chromecast devices will also show up in this overview, but they cannot be used with the Android TV app. This is a limitation in the discovery protocol.

error.unpaired: The device was un-paired and needs to be re-paired
